MiniPoop.name: Alien Feces (Small)
MiniPoop.desc: A small quantity of fecal matter from alien fauna.

BaseSonar.name: Seabase Sonar Antenna
BaseSonar.desc: Continuously fires sonar pulses from a seabase.

BaseRepellent.name: Creature Repellant Pylon
BaseRepellent.desc: Discourages close approach of creatures to the seabase.

BaseBeacon.name: Seabase Beacon
BaseBeacon.desc: A beacon affixed to the seabase that broadcasts location and status information.

BaseAmpeelAntenna.name: Ampeel Antenna
BaseAmpeelAntenna.desc: Draws small amounts of power from passing ampeels to maintain power in a seabase. Most effective at short range. Not capable of sustaining high power loads.

BaseFarmer.name: Autofarming Unit
BaseFarmer.desc: Automatically harvests from mature plants in nearby growbeds. Will not completely kill the plant.

BaseACUCleaner.name: ACU Cleaning System
BaseACUCleaner.desc: Keeps the ACU clean of debris, including excreted waste from the contained animals.

BaseRemoteCamera.name: Scanner Camera Relay Antenna
BaseRemoteCamera.desc: Eliminates the distance attenuation from scanner room camera signals for the attached seabase.

BaseBattery.name: Seabase Battery Bank
BaseBattery.desc: Generates no power, but significantly increases the maximum storage of a seabase, allowing it to last longer between intermittent power cycles. Stackable effect.
BaseBattery.extradesc: Displays charge state using color indicators.

BaseACUBooster.name: ACU Feeding System
BaseACUBooster.desc: Periodically adds small amounts of plankton to the ACU to top up food supplies for herbivorous fish, increasing their fertility.
BaseACUBooster.extradesc: Only available if Ecocean is installed, as it uses its plankton as a "fuel".

BasePlanktonFeeder.name: Plankton Feeder
BasePlanktonFeeder.desc: Disperses plankton into the water to attract filter feeders and help encourage their reproduction in a wild setting.
BasePlanktonFeeder.extradesc: Only available if Ecocean is installed, as it uses its plankton as a "fuel".

BaseItemDisplay.name: Item Display
BaseItemDisplay.desc: Holds an item in suspension above it for decorative purposes.

BaseDomeLight.name: Dome Light
BaseDomeLight.desc: A small light that illuminates in all directions.
